jei.neoblock.title: NeoBlock Generation
jei.neoblock.dormant: Mod is not active in this world!
tooltip.neoblock.spawn_lore: Using this will ask the trader to bring a %s next time they visit.
message.neoblock.disabled_world_1: This world is not using the §bNeoBlock§r world preset. §bNeoBlock§r has set to dormant.
message.neoblock.disabled_world_2: You can enable the mod with "%s" or setting the force block in config as modpack developer.
message.neoblock.updated_world: This world has been using an old tier config. You need to force update the world with %s.
message.neoblock.unlocking_tier: Tier %d is going to be unlocked!
message.neoblock.unlocking_trader: As a reward for unlocking this tier, a trader with significant trades has been spawned.
message.neoblock.trades.mob: The trader will bring %dx %s next time they visit.
command.neoblock.scheme.save.fail: Unable to save the schematic. Check the server logs for more information.
command.neoblock.scheme.load.fail: Unable to load the schematic. Check the server logs for more information.
command.neoblock.update.success: Tiers has been overwritten with the new config. It might have caused some changes in unlocked tiers.
command.neoblock.disabled: Neoblock has been set to dormant in this world. Enable it with "%s" if you want to.
command.neoblock.force_block: Block has been set to the new position. Previous block has been removed.
command.neoblock.force_block.enabled: Block has been set to the position and the mod has been activated.
command.neoblock.force_trader.success: Summoning the trader has been successful.
command.neoblock.force_trader.failure: Unable to summon another trader. There is no valid trade for trder.
command.neoblock.unlock_tier: Command condition for this tier is now satisfied. The tier should unlock as soon as all conditions are met.
